Interface HtmlComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlFragment, HtmlTag

    public interface HtmlComponent
    Interface to be used by all components to be drawn using the TextWindow. Defines their color, width, and height.
    Since:
    October 21st, 2016
    Author:
    Ofek Gila, Saagar Jha

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Color getColor()
      Returns the Color of this HtmlComponent.
      int getHtmlComponentHeight()
      Returns the height of this component in pixels.
      int getHtmlComponentWidth()
      Returns the width of this component in pixels.

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        java.awt.Color getColor()
        Returns the Color of this HtmlComponent.
        Returns:
        the Color to draw this component with.

      • getHtmlComponentWidth

        int getHtmlComponentWidth()
        Returns the width of this component in pixels.
        Returns:
        the width of this component

      • getHtmlComponentHeight

        int getHtmlComponentHeight()
        Returns the height of this component in pixels.
        Returns:
        the height of this component
